section.heading: Collective bargaining agreements.
section.text: Nothing in [this chapter] shall be interpreted to supersede the terms of a valid collective bargaining agreement.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-305: § 401 of D.C. Law 24-305 provided that the creation of this section by § 106 of D.C. Law 24-305 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-305: § 401 of D.C. Law 24-305 provided that the creation of this section by § 106 of D.C. Law 24-305 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7090(b) of D.C. Law 25-50 amended section 401 of D.C. Law 24-305 changing the applicability provision impacting this section to January 29, 2024. Therefore the creation of this section by Law 24-305 shall be applicable January 29, 2024.
